miniGames.hangman

Class HangmanGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniGames.hangman.HangmanGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class HangmanGame
extends Object
implements ActionListener, KeyListener
    The main hangman minigame class operating algorithmic and graphical parts of the minigame
    Author:
    Piotr Szersze≈Ñ
